caption.p: In vitro inhibitory effect of different concentrations (ppm) of C. martinii essential oil (CMEO) and chitosan encapsulated C. martinii essential oil nanoparticles (Ce-CMEO-NPs) on (A) growth, and level of (B) deoxynivalenol (DON) and (C) zearalenone (ZEA) by F. graminearum in maize. Statistical data were analyzed by one-way ANOVA following Tukeyâ€™s post hoc multiple comparison test and columns with different letters were statistically significant within the group of CMEO and Ce-CMEO-NPs ( p < 0.05).
